title: Cauliflower and chorizo risotto with seared squid
description: Squid and chorizo is a marriage made in heaven – try it in this clever risotto recipe.
ingredients: 250g/9oz Arborio rice, or other Italian risotto rice
1 cauliflower head, cut into small florets
25g/1oz parmesan cheese, grated (or alternative vegetarian hard cheese)
3 medium squid, cleaned, cut into triangles
4 tbsp red amaranth cress, to serve
